metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18200 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The f2fs implementation in the Linux kernel before 4.14 mishandles reference counts associated with f2fs_wait_discard_bios calls, which allows local users to cause a denial of service (BUG), as demonstrated by fstrim.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-18200` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1013-azure - 4.15.0-1013.13~16.04.2
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1014-gcp - 4.15.0-1014.14~16.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-24-generic - 4.15.0-24.26~16.04.1
linux-image-4.15.0-24-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-24.26~16.04.1
linux-image-4.15.0-24-lowlatency - 4.15.0-24.26~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-24-generic - 4.15.0-24.26~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-24-lowlatency - 4.15.0-24.26~16.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1013-azure - 4.15.0-1013.13~16.04.2
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1014-gcp - 4.15.0-1014.14~16.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-24-generic - 4.15.0-24.26~16.04.1
linux-image-4.15.0-24-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-24.26~16.04.1
linux-image-4.15.0-24-lowlatency - 4.15.0-24.26~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-24-generic - 4.15.0-24.26~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-24-lowlatency - 4.15.0-24.26~16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux-azure package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1013.13~16.04.2').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-gcp package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1014.14~16.04.1').
linux-hwe package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-24.26~16.04.1').
linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-signed-azure package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1013.13~16.04.2').
linux-signed-gcp package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1014.14~16.04.1').
linux-signed-hwe package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-24.26~16.04.1').
